alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 4:01AM MST until December 31 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, Moderate to strong wind will combine with light snow accumulations to cause heavy drifting of snow and low visibility in blowing snow. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...The Beaverhead and Lemhi Highlands, including the towns of Dubois, Spencer, and Small. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The heavily drifting snow will hamper snow clearance efforts, causing temporary road and highway closures. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
